entry.title: Half A Man, Half A King
entry.summary:
Author: Khaniya

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,215Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 7

Summary: The young prince had learned to understand grief and its cruel, burdensome taunts. How the aching loss of someone shook the soul, rumbling like a caged wolf. Jumping to bare its claws and teeth. The unutterable sorrow could easily darken a humble heart, leaving resentment in its wake. He’d seen the unwavering sadness and bitter hatred of a grief-stricken man. Arthur had often grown wary of fangs with callous words and sharpened remarks. He skilled himself in hiding discolored bruises with the scent of pride, and hesitation with a perfected smile.A king could not let a mere bite befall him or even a tear to grace his eye, and a king he would one day be. He was taught well of his duties. How to set an example, be the better of the greatest men.So, when Arther Pendragon was informed of the king’s death, he only stilled within his bed. A stunned gasp caught in his throat, his hooded eyes downturn to stare at the sheets beneath him…▂After the sudden death of Uther Pendragon, Arthur is thrusted into the role of king. As he is haunted by his father’s expectations, he uncovers hidden truths about those he trust. One wonders what destiny has written in the blood and sweat of innocence.
